title: Michael Fallon – 2016 Speech at Defence Conference
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Michael Fallon, the Secretary of State for Defence, at the RUSI Land Warfare Conference held in London on 29 June 2016.
content:
[![michaelfallon](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/michaelfallon.jpg)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/michaelfallon.jpg)
